body: What is the answer to life, the universe and everything?
answers: Whatever you want it to be, baby
Never mind the meaning of life, dear, let's have a nice cup of tea

body: How did the knights escape from the monster?
answers: They threw sand in its eyes.
They sought an injunction against the monster.
The animator had a heart attack.

body: What is the worst French insult?
answers: I will make castanets out of your testicles.
I call you a silly thing.
I fart in your general direction.

body: What is the main precursor to armageddon?
answers: A friend shall lose a friend's hammer.
There will be one government ruling the whole world.
Plagues of locusts shall attack every McDonald's in the world and get very sick.
Every first-born child shall be infected with a tickly cough.
The Norwegian Blue prefers kipping on its back.
